title: Premier Asset Management - Multi Asset Video
body:
# Premier Asset Management

Multi-Asset video

## The Task

Create a video for Premier Asset Management that explained the nature of their multi-asset capabilities. 

## The Solution

We developed an animated 60-second film that explained the investment process and advantages of Premier multi-asset fund range. 

## The Result

The video was used at conferences and on their website. It has been effective with both external and internal audiences.
